data.name: Samurai Solitaire. Threads of Fate Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Dive into japanesse world! Get away from the daily rush and feel relax?
Listen amazing unique tracks from the game.

Track list:
1. Ronin's Home - 02:44
2. Samurai Road - 02:18
3. Crane Feather -02:55
4. Threads of Fate - 02:58
5. Yin-Yang - 02:46

Enjoy!
